## Context.IValidatedContextDecl type

Validated declaration of a context, a record with strongly-typed [qualifier type names](./ts-res.qualifiertypename.md) as keys and [qualifier context values](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md) as values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IValidatedContextDecl = Record<QualifierName, QualifierContextValue>;
```
